ActHazardous Products Act
SubjectPhthalates Regulations
PrecisPHTHALATES REGULATIONS to restrict the sale, importation and advertising in Canada of products that present a likely or potential risk for children to develop adverse health effects from exposure to phthalates by aligning Canadian requirements for phthalates in soft vinyl childrenâ€™s toys and child care articles with those of the United States and the European Union.
